name: ShibaPoconk
description: $CONK is a meme token that is community-led and aims to bring fun, value, and utility to the Fantom community. The token was initially created by an artist known as Pocong and was treated as an art project. As part of this project, control of $CONK was transitioned to a multisig composed of members of its community, known as the CONKERS. This transition process has now been completed, and as a result, $CONK is now 100% community-owned.
